item.title: Why Is My Compile Time So Long?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You mean, SRL is taking that long?

SRL Compiled in 16msec.

On another note, are you SURE it can find the colours?

Read full topic
item.source: Why Is My Compile Time So Long?

item.title: Why Is My Compile Time So Long?
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Hey,

 I'm in the middle of writing a script that needs to go from the bank to a person. I don't need any help getting to the person, but while I'm figuring out timings, and the best path to go, I need to stop the script and restart to see if it's working. My problem is that every time I start the script, it takes like a minute and a half to compile and start. Here's the code I'm using:

[code=SCAR]program section;
{.include SRL\SRL.Scar}
begin
setupSRL;
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, 4156994, 673, 62, 689, 80) then //first(cactus outside bank
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
Wait(4000+random(2000));
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, 2121260, 674, 32, 692, 53) then//tree north palace
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
Wait(9000+random(2000));
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, 16147520, 693, 85, 714, 105) then//Well north palace
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
Wait(9000+random(2000));
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, 1723171, 629, 13, 648, 34) then//tree north scimmy
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, true);
Wait(9000+random(2000));

end.[/code]

This shouldn’t take 1.5min-2.5 min should it? I don’t understand. I have a 3.0ghz dual core. Why’s it not going as fast as it should?

Help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

Buzzy

Read full topic
item.source: Why Is My Compile Time So Long?
